mainSection.title: Convert shoppers faster and keep them coming back
mainSection.subtitle: Buildnow AI helps retail brands increase conversions, resolve support requests instantly, and deliver personalized experiences with AI voice and video agents across the entire customer journey.

bulletPoints.title: Pre-purchase product guidance
bulletPoints.description: AI agents instantly answer product questions about size, style, ingredients, availability, or compatibility. This improves conversion rates, reduces abandoned carts, and builds shopper confidence.

bulletPoints.title: Order tracking and returns automation
bulletPoints.description: Customers can check order status, start returns or exchanges, and process refunds without waiting on hold. This reduces support volume while delivering a seamless post-purchase experience.

bulletPoints.title: Account updates and subscription support
bulletPoints.description: Allow customers to update shipping info, payment methods, or subscription preferences. Present tailored upsell and retention offers to increase customer lifetime value.

ctaSection.title: See Buildnow AI in action
ctaSection.description: Explore our demo to watch AI agents guide product discovery, assist with orders, and drive repeat purchases. Sign in to test it yourself.

secondarySection.title: Deliver exceptional retail experiences at scale
secondarySection.subtitle: Built for ecommerce brands and consumer companies that want to grow while maintaining exceptional customer service.

bulletPoints.title: Brand-aligned, conversational AI
bulletPoints.description: Every interaction feels like it came from your best store associate. Your AI agent reflects your brand voice and pulls from CRM, product catalogs, and inventory systems to give accurate, contextual answers.

bulletPoints.title: Agile, campaign-ready platform
bulletPoints.description: Roll out flash sales, promotions, or seasonal updates instantly. When a question is too complex, seamlessly transfer to a live agent with full context.

bulletPoints.title: Secure and customer-first by design
bulletPoints.description: Protect shopper data with built-in privacy tools, encryption, and ongoing quality assurance. Maintain control with approved scripts, monitoring, and customizable workflows.
